description_text:

Martin

conversations.body_text: Hi Martin Edge,    Is it missing this carbon fiber heel plate? Please provide a photo so we can confirm.

There you go

Martin Edge
Managing Director
Phone: +61 439 367 205
[signatureImage]
________________________________
Hi Martin Edge,    We apologise for the inconvenience and will send you a replacement board.

Thankyou so much ??

Cheers
Martin
